referralSuperHeroSection.p1: has invited you to join Festival Pass! When you become a member, you will help them get to their next festival or event.

aboutUs.title: WHAT IS FESTIVAL PASS?
aboutUs.subtitle: The world's first festival subscription service across music, film, food & wine and more. Enjoy hundreds of festivals locally and globally for one monthly fee.

howItWorks.title: Using Festival Pass is easy
howItWorks.subtitle: Let us show you how it works

step1.title: Pick your monthly plan
step1.body: Get monthly credits to use at every festival or event in the network. There is an experience for everyone.

step2.title: Search for any festival or event
step2.body: Filter by time, genre, location and even mood. Not sure where to start? Weâ€™ll help with personalized recommendations.

step3.title: Secure your admission
step3.body: We werenâ€™t kidding when we say itâ€™s easy. Reserve your admission ticket in a tap.  Sometimes even get additional perks and automatic upgrades!

step4.title: Get friends to join you
step4.body: Invite your friends right through the app, share your experiences and get rewarded when they join Festival Pass and you at the event.

step5.title: Create your perfect weekend or trip
step5.body: ...live life live.  Get out and see an artist, try new wine, taste amazing food, see a film and hear from the director.  Be a part of an inspired life.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.p1: Festival Pass is a story about community and creating experiences that change you. We as humans need connection - itâ€™s in our DNA, as strong a need as food, water and warmth.
ourStory.p2: The team at Festival Pass, that spans the globe from Bali to NY to Detroit to Lisbon, is bringing our members the only place to make accessing, discovering and attending festivals across music, film, art, food & wine, and tech & innovation the most user friendly, frictionless, affordable and valuable member experience possible.
ourStory.p3: We strive every day to secure new event partners, think about what we ourselves would want from a social mobile app that compliments our live experience and encourages all to live, life, live.
ourStory.p4: Now festival goers from music, art, food & wine, film and other interests can become a member of Festival Pass and join the millions of life fans from around the world choosing to enjoy experiences live.
ourStory.p5: In order to make our dream for you a reality and get the input and support of our tribe from the outset, we are providing the opportunity for a few thousand Founding Members to join us in changing how we all experience festivals and events.
ourStory.illustrationAlt: Festival Pass is a story about community and creating experiences that change you.

foundingMember.title: Why become a founding member?
foundingMember.footNote: * $85/month when paid upfront for a 12 month subscription. $99/month paid monthly. Paid upfront subscriptions will receive the full 1200 credit allotment for all 12 months upfront to be used as desired.

paymentPage.title: Payment Info
paymentPage.subtitle: You will be billed ${{amount}} to secure your {{planName}}. This will cover your first month subscription.
paymentPage.annualPlanSubtitle: You will be billed ${{amount}} to secure your 12 month pre-paid {{planName}}. This will cover your first 12 months of subscription. Your {{credits}} credits will immediately post to your account.

paymentSuccessfulPage.title: Congratulations! ðŸŽ‰

Give them additional credits when they sign up and earn up to double additional credits for yourself!

paymentSuccessfulPage.bullet2: Save up credits to redeem big ticket events later.
paymentSuccessfulPage.bullet3: Your first payment will be used for your 1st month subscription, 2nd month will not be billed until 30 days after your signup date.

giftingPaymentSuccessfulPage.subtitle: Your gift membership purchase is confirmed. You just purchased the best gift for 2021!  A year of live events.
giftingPaymentSuccessfulPage.content: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address with the gift membership code. You or your loved one can redeem the code when ready at <0>https://www.festivalpass.com/register</0> - Gift recipient can enter the gift code at checkout for payment. Get ready to live.life.live.

bottom.title: Hey Festival Partner! Festival Pass is the best place to find an audience of passionate fans that want to attend your event.

one.title: Frictionless social engagement platform
one.content: Weâ€™re all about creating a frictionless social engagement platform for audiences globally. Let our user base know about your wonderful event!

two.title: We love festivals just like you
two.content: Our mission is to inspire people to lead active and engaging lives every day by participating in live community events locally and globally.

three.title: Join the Festival Pass Movement
three.contentP1: First monthly subscription service across all types of festivals including Music, Film, Food & Wine and more. Join us in helping our members

manageEventsPage.title: Manage Events
manageEventsPage.subtitle: Hi festivalPass partner. You can manage all your events here. Click your event to add/edit details of your event.
manageEventsPage.missingPartnerIdErrorMessage: Only authenticated festival partners can manage events
manageEventsPage.failedDataFetchError: Unfortunately something went wrong. Please let us know so we can help you out.

title.title: Name Your Event
title.subtitle: You are an important partner of festivalPass. Weâ€™re excited to see what you're organizing, and weâ€™re even more excited to help you make it a success.  As you enter/edit information about your event it will appear on the right side screen as it will appear on your unique event page within festivalPass.

description.title: Describe Your Event
description.subtitle: Enter a description of your event. More details the better!

categories.title: Choose Categories for Your Event
categories.subtitle: Assigning relevant categories helps your audience to find your festival better in search and in our recommendation engine.

location.title: Event Location
location.subtitle: Enter the location of your event. The more specific the better!

date.title: When Will Your Event Take Place
date.subtitle: Timing is everything. Only Choose a date in the future. Past events will be tagged as non active.

links.title: Website & Social
links.subtitle: Share links to your official website and social media. Our Members always want to know more! We will auto create your festivalPass URL to share. Please edit if you prefer another one.

capacity.title: Event Capacity
capacity.subtitle: Please share the total maximum capacity of your event. This helps us categorize Your Event for our Members.

status.title: Event Status
status.subtitle: Set the status to active to make your event publicly available.

gallery.title: Gallery

claimEventConfirmationPage.feature2: View engagement metrics for your event
